thread.title: Rebecca
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text:
I have 15 more pieces of art to frame, and look forward to remaining a customer of American Frames.
I ordered 3 custom-size wood diploma frames with double mats, and it was very easy to assemble the frames. I purchased them so that I did not have to glue the frames, but I only had to add the pressure springs and the sawtooth hanger.
The only thing that I did not need for assembling the frame was a power drill; it is easy enough to just screw in the pressure springs.
Package arrived in a timely manner, and everything was well worth the price. I will be a repeat and continued customer for sure.
